1: -module(hty_fspath_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -export([all/0, groups/0,
    4:     init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
    5:      move_direct_child_file/1,
    6:     move_direct_child_folder/1,
    7:     move_nested_source/1
    8: ]).
    9: 
   10: all() -> [
   11:     {group, move}
   12: ].
   13: 
   14: groups() -> [
   15:   {move, [
   16:     move_direct_child_file,
   17:     move_direct_child_folder,
   18:     move_nested_source
   19:   ]}
   20: ].
   21: 
   22: move_direct_child_file(Cfg) ->
   23:   test_move(Cfg, "move_direct_child_file_src", "move_direct_child_file_dst").
   24: 
   25: move_direct_child_folder(Cfg) -> 
   26:     test_move(Cfg, "move_direct_child_folder_src",  "move_direct_child_folder_dst").
   27:     
   28: move_nested_source(Cfg) -> 
   29:     test_move(Cfg, "move_nested_source_src/file2move", "move_nested_source_dst/file2move").
   30: 
   31: test_move(Cfg, From, To) ->
   32:   Filesdir = proplists:get_value(files_dir, Cfg),
   33:   From1 = Filesdir ++ From,
   34:   To1 = Filesdir ++ To,
   35:   io:format("Fromfile is [~p] and Tofile is [~p]~n", [From1, To1]),
   36:   true = filelib:is_file(From1),
   37:   false = filelib:is_file(To1),
   38:   Frompath = hty_fspath:new(From1),
   39:   Topath = hty_fspath:new(To1),
   40:   ok = hty_fspath:move(Frompath, Topath),
   41:   true = filelib:is_file(To1),
   42:   false = filelib:is_file(From1).
   43: 
   44: init_per_group(move, Config) ->
   45:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   46:     Fromdir = Datadir ++ "move/files/",
   47:     Todir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config) ++ "move/files/",
   48:     copy_fixture(Fromdir, Todir),
   49:     [{files_dir, Todir}|Config];
   50: 
   51: init_per_group(_, Cfg) -> Cfg.
   52: 
   53: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: %%% Support
   57: copy_fixture(From, To) ->
   58:     case filelib:is_dir(From) of
   59:         true ->
   60:             filelib:ensure_dir(To),
   61:             file:make_dir(To),
   62:             {ok, Filenames} = file:list_dir(From),
   63:             lists:foreach(fun(Filename) ->
   64:                 copy_fixture(From ++ "/" ++ Filename, To ++ "/" ++ Filename)
   65:             end, Filenames);
   66:         false ->
   67:             ok = filelib:ensure_dir(To),
   68:             io:format("Copying from ~s to ~s", [From, To]),
   69:             {ok, _} = file:copy(From, To)
   70:     end.
